summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2092 for the improvement of Fifth Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, from East Eighty-second Street to East Eighty-fifth Street, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all gates, tees, crosses and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service of said district, under Ordinance No. 21186, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
